document_data.name: Eating disease
document_data.mainbody: The so-called '''eating disease''' was a natural affliction that affected those who were born in the jungles of [[Chult]].
document_data.Effects: The eating disease was quite rare and its main effect was turning skin on the affected areas to form into scale-like calluses that greatly resembled those of a [[serpent]]. The disease often affected the forearms, making it fairly noticeable when exposed.
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], a dark-skinned [[Chultan]] [[human]] afflicted with the disease was one of the eclectic and multi-ethnic crew of a pirate vessel, the ''[[Black Dragon (ship)|Black Dragon]]'', helmed by the infamous [[Orim Redbeard]].
